summary:
My belief is, 
that by utilizing all people’s and company strengths, seeing potentials as opportunities and embracing changing word and society, we can move any business forward and harvest from co-worker and customer, satisfaction and loyalty. 
Always work through people towards clear objectives, starting with the why, Translate complexity by targeted communication into understandable content for diverse individuals to get them engaged and have everyone on board.
Last but most important of all, LOVE what you do and have PASSION for it, if not seek something that will give you this.

profile_positions.description:
Working in Service Office responsible for Czechia - Hungary - Slovakia Fulfilment Operations (Supply-In store Logistics-Services-Last Mile Delivery)
•	Establishment of New Fulfilment organization in CZHUSK
•	Leading Stores transformation for the Fulfilment concept implementation in CZHUSK
•	Development of Multichannel Strategy for CZHUSK
•	Support concept and implementation of new Price & Quality Service Strategy 
•	Last mile delivery Optimization
profile_positions.title: Country Customer Fulfilment Manager

profile_positions.description:
Working in Service Office responsible for Czechia - Hungary - Slovakia Logistics Operations
•	Design of Store Fulfillment concept in CZHUSK
•	Development of Multichannel Strategy for CZHUSK
profile_positions.title: Country Retail Logistics Manager

profile_positions.description:
Working in Service Office responsible for Czechia - Hungary - Slovakia Logistics Operations
     •	Chairman of the DCGEEC operational forum team, helping to secure good cooperation between Retail Units, Distribution Centers 
     •	Member of the Global CN Capacity group with aim to determine on a global level best tools and working methods for dimensioning stores and range sizes.
     •	Developed new Functional Reviewers for CZHUSK organization in order to maintain a high level of operational readiness.
profile_positions.title: Country Deputy Retail Logistics Manager

profile_positions.description:
Working in Service Office responsible for Czechia - Hungary - Slovakia In-store Logistics Operations•	Reorganized all follow-up material and created new tools to help stores identify where they need to focus. Shared tools with global and helped other countries on how to use them.
     •	Supported different functions (sales - SLM, planning, Self Serve Furniture Area guideline, expansion - Brno link, Budapest III., capacity planning) and helped in updating the role of logistics within the SO commercial team.
     •	Performed functional reviews in stores to increase performance and share knowledge.  
     •	Sales Location Management (SLM) – super user for Country Logistics. Trained and educated all stores together with Sales super user on how to work with SLM.
profile_positions.title: Country In Store Logistics Manager

profile_positions.description:
Working in Store Cerny Most as Logistics Manager.
     •	Reorganized structure of department to improve performance and efficiency (created store processes, improved follow up tools, opened new External Warehouse – resulting in increase of DD share more than 5 % within 1 year / secured long term capacity).
     •	Established rules for the presence and better cooperation of logistics inside the commercial team and especially during the work brief process.
     •	Developed the knowledge of team members securing proper succession planning.
     •	Shared knowledge and tools with other stores in the region
profile_positions.title: Store Logistic Manager

profile_positions.description:
Working in IKEA Greece Service Office
Responsible for Greece - Cyprus - Bulgaria In Store Logistics Operations
     •	Co-created the Retail Logistics Strategy for the Region.
     •	Participated in master plan process and participated in Sales Steering meetings.
     •	Performed functional reviews in stores to increase performance and share knowledge.  
     •	Restructured all local routines and updated many of them.
     •	Organized and executed the warehouse recovery clean-up project in Cyprus.
profile_positions.title: Country In Store Logistics Manager

profile_positions.description:
Working in IKEA Greece in IKEA Athens Airport Store
     •	Part of a 5 (cross functional_ member’s team aiming to evaluate and identify future expansion plans for IKEA Greece looking new areas to open IKEA stores. (process was a 1 year task in parallel to Logistics Managers Position)
     •	Improved greatly the productivity of the department by evaluating how we work and changing the store’s goods flow processes.
     •	Created tools used by all stores to follow up the performance.
     •	Evaluated and improved all safety processes in the department (used by SO as good example).
     •	Participated in Delft’s “In Store Logistics Training”.
     •	Part of the “Virtual Store Team” created by SO, aiming to create a store placing the best co-worker in each position. 
     •	Responsible to secure that store is ready to become Navision IKEA Pilot store. Succeeded in the role after store nomination and IKEA Athens Airport store becoming the Navision Pilot store for all upcoming Navision releases.
profile_positions.title: Store Logistics Manager

profile_positions.description:
Working in IKEA Greece in IKEA Athens Airport Store
     •	Responsible for Decoration department including yearly Seasonal activities.
     •	Achieved the highest development in sales among all stores departments for two consecutive years (+20% 1st year, +15% 2nd).
     •	Successfully implementing all seasonal activities managing to sell all qtys on time.
     •	Developed a highly motivated and capable sales team from which new managers managed to evolve into the company.
     •	Participated and helped in the opening of 2nd store in Athens and in the 1st store to open in Cyprus.
profile_positions.title: Sales Shopkeeper

profile_positions.description:
Working in IKEA Greece in IKEA Athens Airport Store
    •	Established the routines and the way the department will follow up the performance.
    •	Achieved sales higher than the targeted 6.5% in consecutive years (10% result of total store sales). 
    •	Trained and educated people in Addon selling.
    •	Country racking responsible. Responsible for the storage and ordering process in order to optimize and reduce operational costs.
    •	Taking part during Build Up of Athens Airport Store. Racking and tools warehouse responsible during build-up of the store
profile_positions.title: Sales Addon Team Leader
